column5: We will be going to Moosehorn Lodge on Lac seul and would like to know some of the better spots on the lake for #1 bigger walleye #2 Big Pike #3 smallmouth and lastly Muskie...last year we went caught alot of fish but nothing of size please help my son get a trophy...thanks csuram

Wev'e been going 6yrs now to Lac Seul and we havent caught a trophy yet either (28in walleye and 40in northern is the biggest so far).Iv'e been told that you can't be worried about the numbers you catch if you want the big girls.Fish next to the deep water off the main channel around sunken Islands and sand bottoms.If your catching alot of 18-25in walleye maybe go alittle deeper.I'm know expert but thats what were going to try.Good Luck Catch and Release the Big Ones so somebody else has a chance to catch there DREAM FISH.

I've stayed at Moosehorn and we had the same problem. We took and motored to the spot where the trailer your boat over and drop you off on the other side of Lac Seul. The only thing is they only do this until 4:00pm each day. So you need to head back about 2:30. Use your map and try to get to Grassy Bay. We scored some nice fish in good quantities between 5 and 7 lbs.
